Description:
Primary Duties & responsibilities include but not limited to:Implement purchasing best practices, policies & procedures
Continuously evaluate products, services and vendors to determine improvement and also to source products that provide the best value.
Direct procurement policies to ensure all items are purchased and delivered within budget and time constraints
Update and maintain all necessary documents with confidentiality.
Maintain effective and efficient MIS and generate reports desired by the management.
Trains all store staff to bring them to their expected standards keeping in mind the company's culture and corporate identity.
Be responsible for daily purchase and the handling of cash related to it.
Responsible for all store activities like issuing, receiving and stock.
Must visit outlets on call and handle any specific jobs as instructed by the management.
Assist in resolving any import/export ministry issues;
Develop and maintain strategic relationships with key suppliers and vendors
Develop and maintain constructive and cooperative working relationships with colleagues and management.
Should constantly be in touch with all the latest trends in the industry and acquire all necessary skills necessary as the company keeps growing.
Execute any other related tasks assigned by the management or management representative.Skills
Skills:
Solid analytical skills, with the ability to create reports and conduct cost analysis
Negotiation and Problem-solving skills
Multi-tasking ability and an Analytical Thinker
Good communication and ability to lead a team
Time management and multitasking
Minimum 2 years experience in the respective field
